program.name: python -m ep_bolfi.kadi_tools.extract_measurement_protocol
program.description: Please refer to the --help output of this file.

param.description: File name as template for output files.
param.name: filename

param.description: First segment to include in the plot.
param.name: start

param.description: Segment after the last one to include in the plot.
param.name: stop

param.description: Step between segments to include in the plot.
param.name: step

param.description: Time unit to use for the timespans.
param.name: time-unit

param.description: Optional name of a column stored in the 'other_columns' attribute. Will be used then to describe the individual segments.
param.name: state-column

param.description: If the mean current during a segment is below this value, it will be regarded as zero current for the whole segment for more sensible simulations.
param.name: current-threshold

param.description: Defaults to False, where positive current means discharge. Change to True if positive current shall mean charge.
param.name: flip-current-sign

param.description: If the standard deviation of the voltage during a segment is below this value, it will be regarded as zero deviation voltage for the whole segment, i.e., holding at this voltage.
param.name: voltage-deviation-threshold

param.description: Defaults to False, where measured voltage remains unaltered. Change to True if the voltage shall be multiplied by -1.
param.name: flip-voltage-sign

param.description: Whether or not an already existing file by the same name in the record gets overwritten.
param.name: overwrite
